Item.Description: A Kingdom that primarily raids nearby Kingdoms.
A Kingdom that profits from buying and selling goods across the region. They have a great variety and amount of items, but the prices are a little bit higher than other merchants.
A Kingdom whose primary export is stone and ore, which they offer at a reduced rate. They are willing to trade more for basic supplies like food, drink, wood, bandages, and pick axes.

A logging and hunting camp whose primary export are logs, meat, hides, bones, metal loot and captured wild animals. They are willing to trade more for supplies like tools, salt, food, drink, bandages, armor, ranged weapons, ammo and traps.

A Kingdom whose primary export is food, drink, cloth, and animal products, which they offer at a reduced rate. They're willing to pay more for supplies such as tools, salt, seeds, straw, bonemeal, and building materials. They also buy trade goods, furniture and clothing.
